posts.author: Duplicate Ryan Kanarek
posts.post_text: August 10, 2017 at 2:17 PM#2This is not possible. You have to build your views manually, then you could store them via macro if you wanted to. Is there a reason you need to automate building views? This is the point of userprofiles, so that you only need to build views once, and then you can use them forever.

posts.author: cn.liupei@live.com
